PetSitters.title: Best Pet Sitter in the world
PetSitters.description:
Hello parents!
If u need someone to take care of your pets, even if it’s a last minute thing, I am the right person to help.
I’ve always loved animals, since I was little so this is basically my dream job .
I have experience with animals, I have myself a cat that loves new friends.
I can provide dog/cat boarding, they can stay for a few days, I can walk them as much as they want and will provide all the love and care they need.
If u need help, give me a call!

reviews.title: Very Impressed
reviews.body: Cláudia pet-sat our antisocial cat for 6 days and we were very happy with the experience. At first I thought Cláudia would have no luck trying to interact with our cat, but I was really surprised when she conquered it over only a few days! And she also sent us videos and photos of our cat regularly, which really helped put our minds at ease.

reviews.title: Will book again
reviews.body: Couldn’t ask for someone better to look after my cat. She does a better job then I do. Really recommend Cláudia !! She will be taking care of my cat on all future occasions no doubts

reviews.title: Great person but needs to improve place
reviews.body: Claudia is a great human being, unfurtanally my cat did not adapt to her place and found it very uncufortable.

PetSitters.title: Lisbon Dog Walker
PetSitters.description: Flexible and trustworthy pet sitter who love animals. My entire life I’ve been surrounded by dogs and cats. I had to leave my country and now I would like a fluffy friend to provide care and love!I used to have 3 dogs back in my home country , Mia, Bailey and Sombra. All of them were rescued from the streets.

reviews.title: The best one
reviews.body: Valen is the best She took amazing care off Beth over the weekend and I could just tell how happy and relieved Beth was

reviews.title: It was good
reviews.body: All was good, thank you for your help. I'd just recommend you to clean eating place and toilet little bit more careful. Thanks.

reviews.title: I recomend Valentina
reviews.body: Valentina took amazingly good care of our scruffy. It looks like he found a second home with Valentina and her boy friend. Our dog is usually gets home sick, but this is the first time around he did not miss us that much.

reviews.title: Highly recomend her!
reviews.body: She is the best Pet sitter ever, I left my dog Batu with her for 5 nights and everything was great, she was doing her job and taking care of my Batu in an excellent way, she was sending me photos and videos on a daily basis, and as a personality she is intelligent, polite... As a conclusion, I highly recommend her if you would like to keep your dog with a safe hands

PetSitters.title: Cat Sitting
PetSitters.description:
Hi! I’m Irene, 22 years old. I’m a psichology student and I’m used ti animals since I was born . I can take care of out dog or cat during your holidays!
Dogs shouldn’t be fugitive or aggressive and I always ask a kitten onwer to cut off the nails before the stay do as not to cause harm if they act aggressively.
I have always loved cats and I feel very attached to them.
I have cats and a small dog. I love dogs but since I have cats I fell in love with these wonderful beings!

reviews.title: Irene the best is the best caregiver
reviews.body: Irene has taken good care of my two cats. She is very kind and provided updates everyday on them. Thanks very much!

reviews.title: Excellent sitter
reviews.body: Irene was great.  Very accommodating and kept us constantly updated with photos and videos. Only with her 1 night this time but we have already booked again for our next trip away! Would highly recommend.
